content: tiramisu baby blanket size 32 inches x 32 inches materials 7 skeins blue sky alpacas organic cotton 150 yards/100 g in color bone 80 i hook or size hook needed to match gauge 5 yards ½-inch-wide silk ribbon in chocolate brown gauge 12 sts and 13 row = 4 inches in single_crochet abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet =single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch skip = skip round = round directions main blanket chain 91 foundation row rs 2 single_crochet in 3rd chain from hook skip next chain 2 single_crochet in next chain across to end turn 90 sts row 2 chain 1 skip first single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet skip 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet across to end turn 90 sts repeat row 2 until blanket is 30 inches from bottom edging round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across to end of row 2 more single_crochet in last single_crochet corner turned single_crochet 88 evenly across left edge 3 single_crochet in bottom loop of first foundation chain corner turned single_crochet in bottom loop of each chain across to end 2 more single_crochet in last loop corner turned single_crochet 88 evenly across right edge to end 1 more single_crochet in last space join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet of round corner turned 348 sts 88 per side with 3 in each corner round 2 chain 4 counts as first double_crochet and chain-1 space skip 1 single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 1 across to corner double_crochet in same single_crochet chain 1 2 times more corner turned repeat around for next three sides of blanket only repeating last double_crochet in same single_crochet ch1 one time in last corner join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of 1st chain-4 round 3 skip chain-1 space 5 double_crochet in next double_crochet skip chain-1 space slip_stitch in next double_crochet around entire edge of blanket fasten_off to finish weave ribbon through dcs and tie in bow at corner copyright 2006-2007 alicia paulson all rights reserved no part of this pattern may be reproduced in any form the written instructions photograph design and pattern are intended for personal non-commercial use only
